name: Transience (Pineberry Fox)
description:
Playing the Game

Requires a Game Boy Advance emulator to play. See https://endrift.github.io/gbajs/ for an online experience!

Use the D-pad to move, jump with A, attack with B, and move your camera with L and R.

This was made for Major Jam 4: Cosmic in which the limitation was that the player must cheat. If you get stuck, you probably need to cheat yourself unstuck!

Credits

Assets not noted below are my own.

Graphics
  • starry background from NASA's "Spitzer Digs Up Galactic Fossil"
  • sprites modified from the Heroic Asset Series Creature Pack (version 1.3) by Aleksandr Makarov
Music
  • Something Sinister by ant512, obtained under the CC-BY 3.0 license
  • humanitarius by null1024, obtained under the CC-BY 3.0 license
